title: Sokoban level 1q
data:
**Sokoban level 1q** is one of the new maps for [Sokoban](/wiki/Sokoban "Sokoban") in some [variants](/wiki/Variant "Variant") of *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*. It may appear as a first level map in [GruntHack](/wiki/GruntHack "GruntHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"); in Hack'EM, this map is named **"One More Time"** in the Sokoban level data. It has 11 [boulders](/wiki/Boulder "Boulder") and 10 [holes](/wiki/Hole "Hole"), leaving 1 spare boulder.

```
-------------  0 boulder
|<|.....|..--  ^ hole
|^|.0.00|...|  > starting position/downstairs
|^|-0....0.--  < upstairs
|^||..0.-...|  ? scroll of earth
|^|---.--.0>|
|^|  |0---.--
|^|  |.---.---
|^----.--....|
|..^^^..0..0.|
|??------..0.|
----    |...--
        -----
```

## Strategy

Open the path down from the starting room:

```
-------------  A dddd d
|<|.....|..-- 
|^|.J.IH|...| 
|^|-K....E.-- 
|^||..G.-...| 
|^|---.--.A>| 
|^|  |F---.--
|^|  |.---.---
|^----.--....|
|..^^^..B..C.|
|??------..D.|
----    |...--
        -----
```

Push the boulders in that room towards the first three holes:

```
-------------  B lll*
|<|.....|..--  C llll lll*
|^|.J.IH|...|  A ulll llll*
|^|-K....E.--  
|^||..G.-...|  
|^|---.--..>|  
|^|  |F---.--
|^|  |.---.---
|^----.--....|
|..^^^..B..C.|
|??------.AD.|
----    |...--
        ----- 
```

Grab the scrolls of [earth](/wiki/Scroll_of_earth "Scroll of earth"), then use up the remaining fourth boulder before opening up the left path from the starting room:

```
-------------  D ulll llll lllu*
|<|.....|..--  E d
|^|.J.IH|...|  
|^|-K....E.--  
|^||..G.-...|  
|^|---.--..>|  
|^|  |F---.--
|^|  |.---.---
|^----.--....|
|..^^^.......|
|??------..D.|
----    |...--
        ----- 
```

Once this is done, you have a clear path to deal with the next five boulders:

```
-------------  I drrr rddd dddl llll llll uu*
|<|.....|..--  H drrr dddd ddll llll lllu uu*
|^|.J.IH|...|  J rrrd rrrd dddd dlll llll lluu uu*
|^|-K......--  K urrr drrr dddd ddll llll lllu uuuu*
|^||..G.-E..|  E ulll rrrr dddd ddll llll lllu uuuu u*
|^|---.--..>|  
|^|  |F---.--  
|^|  |.---.---
|.----.--....|
|............|
|??------....|
----    |...--
        ----- 
```

Clear a path to push the final boulder in and complete the floor:

```
-------------  G l
|<|.....|..--  F dddl llll uuuu uuu*
|^|.....|...|  
|^|-.......--  
|^||..G.-...|  
|^|---.--..>|  
|^|  |F---.--  
|^|  |.---.---
|.----.--....|
|............|
|??------....|
----    |...--
        -----
```

## Next level

- *To be written.*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

Sokoban level 1q

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Sokoban level 1q is one of the new maps for Sokoban in some variants of NetHack. It may appear as a first level map in GruntHack and Hack'EM; in Hack'EM, this map is named "One More Time" in the Sokoban level data. It has 11 boulders and 10 holes, leaving 1 spare boulder. 

-------------  0 boulder
|<|.....|..--  ^ hole
|^|.0.00|...|  > starting position/downstairs
|^|-0....0.--  < upstairs
|^||..0.-...|  ? scroll of earth
|^|---.--.0>|
|^|  |0---.--
|^|  |.---.---
|^----.--....|
|..^^^..0..0.|
|??------..0.|
----    |...--
        -----

Strategy

Open the path down from the starting room: 

-------------  A dddd d
|<|.....|..-- 
|^|.J.IH|...| 
|^|-K....E.-- 
|^||..G.-...| 
|^|---.--.A>| 
|^|  |F---.--
|^|  |.---.---
|^----.--....|
|..^^^..B..C.|
|??------..D.|
----    |...--
        -----

Push the boulders in that room towards the first three holes: 

-------------  B lll*
|<|.....|..--  C llll lll*
|^|.J.IH|...|  A ulll llll*
|^|-K....E.--  
|^||..G.-...|  
|^|---.--..>|  
|^|  |F---.--
|^|  |.---.---
|^----.--....|
|..^^^..B..C.|
|??------.AD.|
----    |...--
        -----

Grab the scrolls of earth, then use up the remaining fourth boulder before opening up the left path from the starting room: 

-------------  D ulll llll lllu*
|<|.....|..--  E d
|^|.J.IH|...|  
|^|-K....E.--  
|^||..G.-...|  
|^|---.--..>|  
|^|  |F---.--
|^|  |.---.---
|^----.--....|
|..^^^.......|
|??------..D.|
----    |...--
        -----

Once this is done, you have a clear path to deal with the next five boulders: 

-------------  I drrr rddd dddl llll llll uu*
|<|.....|..--  H drrr dddd ddll llll lllu uu*
|^|.J.IH|...|  J rrrd rrrd dddd dlll llll lluu uu*
|^|-K......--  K urrr drrr dddd ddll llll lllu uuuu*
|^||..G.-E..|  E ulll rrrr dddd ddll llll lllu uuuu u*
|^|---.--..>|  
|^|  |F---.--  
|^|  |.---.---
|.----.--....|
|............|
|??------....|
----    |...--
        -----

Clear a path to push the final boulder in and complete the floor: 

-------------  G l
|<|.....|..--  F dddl llll uuuu uuu*
|^|.....|...|  
|^|-.......--  
|^||..G.-...|  
|^|---.--..>|  
|^|  |F---.--  
|^|  |.---.---
|.----.--....|
|............|
|??------....|
----    |...--

Next level

To be written.

It may appear as a first level map in [[GruntHack]] and [[Hack'EM]]; in Hack'EM, this map is named '''"One More Time"''' in the Sokoban level data. It has 11 [[boulder]]s and 10 [[hole]]s, leaving 1 spare boulder.
